email_confirmation.SUBJECT: Confirm your email
email_confirmation.INTRO: Thank you for signing up on our platform. To activate your account, click the button below:
email_confirmation.IGNORE: If you did not request this verification, you can ignore this email.

email_password_request.SUBJECT: Password request change
email_password_request.INTRO: Click the link below to reset your password:
email_password_request.IGNORE: If you did not request this, please ignore this email.

email_password_restored.SUBJECT: Password restored successfully
email_password_restored.INTRO: Your password has been successfully reset
email_password_restored.WARNING: If this was not you, please contact an administrator.
